description.value: Exhibitions held at the Wildenstein Galleries, 1919, 1921; Anderson Galleries, 1922-25; Grand Central Art Galleries, 1926; Brooklyn Museum, 1928/29; Whitney Museum of American Art, 1932.
Organized in 1919 as American Painters, Sculptors and Gravers; changed in 1920 to New Society of Artists; in 1930 to American Society of Painters, Sculptors and Gravers.
